keyPolicies.policyDescription: Managed to get another £44 million for the NHS in Cornwall.
Speaking out to keep post office from closure.

issues.health: Managed to get another £44 million for the NHS in Cornwall.

leaflet.personalStatement: Thank you for the warm welcome I have received when calling around. I've enjoyed meeting up with old friends and new & listening to your views.
leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet appears to be handwritten and mentions past work and respect for previous political figures. The candidate expresses pride in achieving funding for local health services, discusses job issues, and emphasizes local involvement and experience. The candidate also recounts past actions as a campaigner regarding post office closure and charges at the local hospital.
